name: Zombie-Night (MSX) by Alberto Sgaggero - 2022
description:
Zombie Night for MSX By Alberto Sgaggero

Can played with any msx2 emulatore, the simplest way is connect to https://webmsx.org/, drag and drop the .dsk file and perform a reset of msk virtualized machine (cliccking on on/off button on emulatore lower left corner)
